name: DR1FT V3 - Big Update
description:
This is DR1FT V3, the third version of the game DR1FT ment to revive the game and make it alive again...

DR1FT V3:

·Major changes includes:

·Windows updated on some vehicles.

·1 car added.

·2 AI Bots updated with the new car.

·New metalic HQ materials added to the default AI Bots.

·Fixed car position and scale on some cars that caused it to bug the tires.

·Fixed camera FOV (remember that you can press the "V" key to change camera mode).

·Fixed torque again, this time making it more "drifty".

·Updated HUD.

·Updated the map.

·Added a custom 2D cursor.

·Updated completely the value for torque on the wheels so now it feels fast.

·Updated AI Bots torque.

·Updated AI and player's top speed.

·Now difficulty varies depending on the AI Bot and not only by their number.

·Changed the in-game songs.

·Added lights to the AE86 headlights.

·All other versions will be available at fancyratgames.itch.io/DR1FT
